sentence.Network_en: At best Nella would be an invalid; at worst she would die.
sentence.Network_cn: 内拉往好里说会落下残疾，往坏处说可能会生命不保。

sentence.Network_en: Nella stood at the end of the gangway.
He looked fixedly at Nella and started back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他目不转睛地看着内拉,接着往后一缩.
